channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Terrifying flash flood chased me home before water burst through our barrier'
item.description: Tim Maher has described the moment flood waters broke the banks of a river in Nottinghamshire and raced towards his home, before breaking though a bar...

item.title: Gurning champion is so good he’s just won it for the eighth year in a row
item.description: The act of pulling silly faces is an art form, perfected over time, with competitors returning year after year to take part.

item.title: Nationwide confirms new mortgage loan rates six times annual salary
item.description: The new deal from Nationwide will allow a couple earning £50,000 between them to borrow £300,000, which is some £75,000 more than previously

item.title: Market town’s art gallery in hot water over very fruity window display
item.description: Artist Poppy Baynam said women who object are probably heterosexual and have never seen a vulva.

item.title: Majority of Brits find it 'extremely challenging' to talk about feelings, poll suggests
item.description: Interflora commissioned the new poll and urged people to be more open with one another to help build stronger relationships and, ultimately, lead a ha...

item.title: The ‘nuclear test’ spotted by a satellite nobody’s owning up to 45 years later
item.description: The double flash could have been a nuclear explosion of two to three kilotonnes - equivalent to 2-3,000 tonnes of TNT.

item.title: 'We lost 6 stone in six months thanks to Michael Mosley - he changed our lives forever'
item.description: The tragic death of Michael Mosley felt 'close to home' for married couple Chris and Lindsay, who transformed their lives by following the TV doctor's...

item.title: Zoo’s ‘barking’ pandas turned out to be painted dogs
item.description: People have, understandably, asked for their money back.

item.title: Monty Don’s firm advice to protect rhododendrons now with quick garden job
item.description: Monty Don has shared some expert tips for keeping your flowers blooming during the next month - and it turns out they're easily influenced by your act...

item.title: YouTuber ‘plays with death’ as he enters bear cave moments before it returns
item.description: Influencer Stefan Jankovich is the newest contestant for scariest stunt of the year, as he willingly sits in a bear cave waiting for it the return.
